group_1.textLeft: The fireworks are truly beautiful.@It's like a dream...

group_1.textRight: Yeah...it really is.

group_1.narration: "My family went to this big new pool..."
"They spent the day having fun@with the big girls they met there,@and then spent the night watching@the fireworks go off..."

group_1.textLeft: ...But, you know, I wasn't there.
It was as if I never existed in the first place.
My younger sister who hadn't been born yet@was grown up.
I guessed it was a dream from years@in the future.

group_1.textRight: Manatsu...

group_1.textLeft: But both Mom and Dad looked really happy.
They were both working at the observatory...
They gave up on their dreams because of me,@but they were fulfilling them in the future.
That's why, I thought...
Mom and Dad would be happier without me.
That's when Kyubey came to my room.

group_1.textRight: ...Do you wish for me to make your dream@of the future a reality?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, please!
Mom and Dad gave up on their dreams@because of me...
But in that future, their dreams came true,@and they were happy.
So please...!

group_1.textRight: I see.
You wish to interfere with fate, so that in@several years from now,
that day of happiness you dreamed about will@be reproduced exactly as you witnessed it,
to make your parents' dream come true...@Is that correct?

group_1.textLeft: Yes!

group_1.textRight: However, you did not exist in that dream, yes?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I don't mind.
If my wish comes true, will I disappear?

group_1.textRight: It's unlikely for you to physically disappear@once you become a Magical Girl.
But your existence will disappear from your@parents' memories and public records.
You will likely have to live on your own.

group_1.textLeft: But my wish will come true, right?

group_1.textRight: I can assure you of that.
However, it will take place several years@from now.
If you're dead by then,
you will be unable to confirm the results.

group_1.textLeft: That doesn't matter to me!

group_1.narration: "The 'Message from Earth' project has@been officially disbanded as of today!"
"Everyone, thank you all@for your hard work!"

group_1.textRight: Phew...
I guess this means goodbye to the observatory@and our research.

group_1.textLeft: Indeed, for both of us.
But it was nice being able to pursue our dream@in the end.

group_1.textRight: We were finally allowed to use the observatory's@communications equipment.
I suppose it was a gift from the heavens.

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle*
Hello... Yes, we're both here, although we're@about to leave.
What...?@But, isn't this abrupt?
All right, I'll let him know.

group_1.textRight: Who was it?

group_1.textLeft: It's the director! He wants the two of us to stay@at the observatory.

group_1.textRight: Why now, out of nowhere...?

group_1.textLeft: They're expanding the observatory, and@increasing the budget and the staff.
They're going to give us permanent positions,@and the benefits will be much better.

group_1.textRight: It's like a miracle...
